worksheet.title: Discovery guide
worksheet.activity:
Let \funcdef{T}{\poly_3(\R)}{\matrixring_2(\R)} and \funcdef{S}{\matrixring_2(\R)}{\R^1} be defined by
T(a x^3 + b x^2 + c x + d) \amp = \begin{bmatrix} a + b \amp b + c \\ c + d \amp d - a \end{bmatrix} \text{,} \amp S\left(\begin{bmatrix} a \amp b \\ c \amp d \end{bmatrix}\right) \amp = a + d .
Are T and S linear?
What are the domain and the codomain of the composite transformation S \circ T?
Compute a general input-output formula for S \circ T similar to the formulas for S and T defined above.
Is S \circ T linear?

activity.p: Verify that if \funcdef{T}{U}{V} and \funcdef{S}{V}{W} are linear, then \funcdef{S \circ T}{U}{W} is also linear.
